original_text: But in the evening he took his daughter Leah and brought her to Jacob, and he went in to her.
korean_text: 저녁에 그의 딸 레아를 야곱에게로 데려가매 야곱이 그에게로 들어가니라

sentences.original_text: But in the evening he took his daughter Leah
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 저녁에 그는 딸 레아를 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and he went in to her.
